fivePillars.description: That Builds Overall Growth. Educational Space That Provides a Unique Lifestyle. 5 centers which act as our pillars of SNS covering all streams of life to strengthen our education system. Rather than providing a traditional learning environment, we focus on building a culture that emphasizes effective teaching and learning, innovation, skill and entrepreneurship development, industry connection, and social responsibility initiatives.
fivePillars.benefits: Applying Design Thinking to all these dimensions helps students to have the academic freedom to understand complex problems and principles through engaging learning activities and nurtures progressive minds. With leading-edge faculty and remarkable alumni, we are committed to providing students with a challenging and relevant education that develops their ability to have an impact on the world and solve the most pressing social issues of our nation.

centers.name: Skill and Career Development
centers.focus: Building Life Skills (Social, Emotional, and Cognitive) through various Clubs.

centers.name: Center For Creativity
centers.focus: Hands-on Experience to Solve Key Industrial Problems through Latest Technologies.

centers.name: Industry Institute Partnership Cell
centers.focus: Connecting and Learning Business Sense of Top Industries.

centers.name: Social Responsibility Initiatives
centers.focus: Giving back to the Society through Social Service.
